name: Heart Connect
description:
Games Now! <HEART CONNECT>

A game to get a score for cats using a mobile phone gyro sensor!

Capture the falling cat's heart and get points!

Obstacles are mixed in between, so please be careful!

Team. <3

Design: Hyeon SeungEun

Character art: Jaana Sundberg

Background, UI: Lee JaeWon

Programming Support: Jeong JeHoon

BGM: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/free-music-tracks-for-games-15...
